channel.title: Hosting is giving me this annoying lag. My question is:
channel.description:
How can I reduce this lag, without buying more memory etc.
The type of lag is when you're freezing up, not the one where when you click it takes a few seconds to respond.

item.title: Hosting is giving me this annoying lag. My question is:
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

The simple fact is: Dont use wL based servers
Use a much cleaner source such as rs2dv or 317Serv and you can hold around 200 people on a 1Ghz 512Mb setup.

Read full topic
